{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Marketer",
  "description": "Clementine Planetary Limited is an engineering solutions company delivering excellence in furniture lights, home and industrial automation control panels, smart tables, electrical installations, plumbing, and other innovative engineering services.

We are in our scale-up stage and looking for a dynamic professional to join our team as a Business Development &amp; Operations Manager. This role is key in building a strong business structure while driving growth through new clients, contracts, and partnerships.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketer

Job Location:&nbsp;Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	We are looking for a smart, result-driven, and creative Marketer to join our growing team.
	If you have strong communication skills, a passion for driving sales, and the ability to build lasting client relationships, then this opportunity is for you.


Responsibilities


	Develop and implement effective marketing strategies to promote the company&rsquo;s products and services.
	Identify new business opportunities, generate leads, and convert them to paying clients.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with customers, partners, and stakeholders.
	Create engaging marketing campaigns both online and offline to enhance brand visibility.
	Conduct market research to understand customer needs, trends, and competition.
	Represent the company at events, exhibitions, and client meetings to showcase offerings.
	Achieve and exceed monthly/quarterly sales and marketing targets.
	Prepare reports and feedback to management on marketing activities and performance.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND/HND/B.Sc. in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field.
	Proven experience in marketing, sales, or business development.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to work independently with little supervision and meet deadlines.
	Strong creativity and problem-solving skills.
	Familiarity with digital marketing and social media campaigns is an added advantage.


Salary &amp; Benefits


	Attractive salary range: N70,000 &ndash; N150,000 monthly (based on experience &amp; performance).
	Incentives and performance-based bonuses.
	Transport allowance.
	Other competitive allowances.
	Opportunity for career growth in a dynamic and supportive environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV and a cover letter to:&nbsp;declementineltd@gmail.com&nbsp;using &ldquo;Application for Marketer Position &ndash; Clementine Planetary Ltd&rdquo;&nbsp;as the subject of the email.",
  "datePosted": "2025-09-19",
  "validThrough": "2025-10-29",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Clementine Planetary Limited"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Rivers (PH)",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "187622"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 0,
      "maxValue": 0,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Marketer Job at Clementine Planetary Limited




        
    

        
        Clementine Planetary Limited is an engineering solutions company delivering excellence in furniture lights, home and industrial automation control panels, smart tables, electrical installations, plumbing, and other innovative engineering services.

We are in our scale-up stage and looking for a dynamic professional to join our team as a Business Development & Operations Manager. This role is key in building a strong business structure while driving growth through new clients, contracts, and partnerships.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketer

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Description
     

            
    




	We are looking for a smart, result-driven, and creative Marketer to join our growing team.
	If you have strong communication skills, a passion for driving sales, and the ability to build lasting client relationships, then this opportunity is for you.


Responsibilities


	Develop and implement effective marketing strategies to promote the company’s products and services.
	Identify new business opportunities, generate leads, and convert them to paying clients.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with customers, partners, and stakeholders.
	Create engaging marketing campaigns both online and offline to enhance brand visibility.
	Conduct market research to understand customer needs, trends, and competition.
	Represent the company at events, exhibitions, and client meetings to showcase offerings.
	Achieve and exceed monthly/quarterly sales and marketing targets.
	Prepare reports and feedback to management on marketing activities and performance.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND/HND/B.Sc. in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field.
	Proven experience in marketing, sales, or business development.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to work independently with little supervision and meet deadlines.
	Strong creativity and problem-solving skills.
	Familiarity with digital marketing and social media campaigns is an added advantage.


Salary & Benefits


	Attractive salary range: N70,000 – N150,000 monthly (based on experience & performance).
	Incentives and performance-based bonuses.
	Transport allowance.
	Other competitive allowances.
	Opportunity for career growth in a dynamic and supportive environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV and a cover letter to: declementineltd@gmail.com using “Application for Marketer Position – Clementine Planetary Ltd” as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

Procurement Officer Job at Techdoctorinnovations




        
    

        
        Techdoctorinnovations, a Social Media Management, Rebranding, and Recruiment firm, is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement Officer

Job Location: Ikeja / Opebi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
     

            
    




	Minimum of OND in Business Admin, Procurement, or related field
	Previous experience in purchasing or procurement (hospitality preferred)
	Strong negotiation and record-keeping skills
	Must be male
	Good communication and interpersonal skills.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: currencytechdoctor@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For Inquiries, WhatsApp: +2349138885064.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Sales / Customer Experience Personnnel",
  "description": "Globalclique provides Real Estate Technologies, HR/Talent Acquisition Support and E-Business Solutions. We are a multi&ndash;disciplinary Solution Company, driven by a commitment to adding value to society through technology innovation.

Our subsidiary, Ibugbe &amp; Partners, is a leader in providing innovative solutions for real estate marketing and development consulting. We leverage our expertise and insights to deliver tailored solutions that enable our clients to achieve their goals and maximize their potential.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales / Customer Experience Personnnel
Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a motivated and customer-focused Sales / Customer Experience Personnel to join our team.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for driving sales, maintaining excellent client relationships, and ensuring that every customer enjoys a seamless and satisfying experience with our products and services.


Key Responsibilities


	Greet, engage, and assist walk-in customers with product inquiries.
	Promote and sell furniture and interior products to new and existing clients.
	Provide detailed information on product features, pricing, and availability.
	Ensure excellent customer service by addressing complaints and following up on client satisfaction.
	Maintain accurate sales records, prepare reports, and update customer databases.
	Collaborate with the design and operations team to ensure smooth service delivery.
	Actively contribute to achieving monthly sales targets.


Requirements


	OND / HND / B.Sc. in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field.
	1&ndash;5 years of proven experience in sales, retail, or customer service, preferably in furniture, interior design, or lifestyle products.
	Strong communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	A customer-first mindset with the ability to handle complaints professionally.
	Proficiency in MS Office and basic use of CRM or POS systems.
	Passion for interior design and trends will be an added advantage.


Benefits


	Attractive base salary plus commission on sales.
	Career growth opportunities in sales and customer management.
	Exposure to the interior design and furnishing industry.
	Supportive and collaborative work environment.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr@globalclique.net&nbsp;using&nbsp;&quot;Application for Sales / Customer Experience Personnel&quot; as the subject of the mail.

Note:&nbsp;Only applications with the correct subject line will be considered.",
  "datePosted": "2025-09-19",
  "validThrough": "2025-10-01",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Globalclique Resources"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Lagos",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "187619"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 0,
      "maxValue": 0,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Sales / Customer Experience Personnnel Job at Globalclique Resources




        
    

        
        Globalclique provides Real Estate Technologies, HR/Talent Acquisition Support and E-Business Solutions. We are a multi–disciplinary Solution Company, driven by a commitment to adding value to society through technology innovation.

Our subsidiary, Ibugbe & Partners, is a leader in providing innovative solutions for real estate marketing and development consulting. We leverage our expertise and insights to deliver tailored solutions that enable our clients to achieve their goals and maximize their potential.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales / Customer Experience Personnnel
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
     

            
    



Job Summary


	We are seeking a motivated and customer-focused Sales / Customer Experience Personnel to join our team.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for driving sales, maintaining excellent client relationships, and ensuring that every customer enjoys a seamless and satisfying experience with our products and services.


Key Responsibilities


	Greet, engage, and assist walk-in customers with product inquiries.
	Promote and sell furniture and interior products to new and existing clients.
	Provide detailed information on product features, pricing, and availability.
	Ensure excellent customer service by addressing complaints and following up on client satisfaction.
	Maintain accurate sales records, prepare reports, and update customer databases.
	Collaborate with the design and operations team to ensure smooth service delivery.
	Actively contribute to achieving monthly sales targets.


Requirements


	OND / HND / B.Sc. in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field.
	1–5 years of proven experience in sales, retail, or customer service, preferably in furniture, interior design, or lifestyle products.
	Strong communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	A customer-first mindset with the ability to handle complaints professionally.
	Proficiency in MS Office and basic use of CRM or POS systems.
	Passion for interior design and trends will be an added advantage.


Benefits


	Attractive base salary plus commission on sales.
	Career growth opportunities in sales and customer management.
	Exposure to the interior design and furnishing industry.
	Supportive and collaborative work environment.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@globalclique.net using "Application for Sales / Customer Experience Personnel" as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only applications with the correct subject line will be considered.    

    

        Click here to Apply

HR Assistant Job at Lasad Ventures




        
    

        
        Lasad Ventures, a retail company is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: HR Assistant

Job Location: Durumi, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibility


	The successful candidate will assist the HR manager.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an NCE, OND, HND, or Bachelor's Degree with 1 - 2 years of experience. 


Salary
N100,000 monthly.
     

            
    



Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: lasadshola@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
